devdoc.details: Token router to swap between the game token and a yielding asset token

SafeCastOverflowedIntToUint(int256).details: An int value doesn't fit in an uint of `bits` size.

SafeCastOverflowedUintToInt(uint256).details: An uint value doesn't fit in an int of `bits` size.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

GameTokenBought(address,address,address,.details: Emitted when POW1 is purchased with the asset token or POW5 is purchased with the stable token

params.assetTokenAddress: The amount of the asset token being spent
params.gameTokenAddress: The address of the POW1 or POW5 token contract
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the POW1
params.sender: The sender of the asset token

GameTokenSold(address,address,address,ad.details: Emitted when POW1 is sold for the asset token or POW5 is sold for the stable token

params.assetTokenReturned: The amount of the asset token received
params.gameTokenAddress: The address of the POW1 or POW5 token contract
params.pow1Amount: The amount of POW1 being spent
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the asset token
params.sender: The sender of the game token

params.marketToken_: The address of the market token
params.pow5MarketPool_: The address of the pool contract for the token pair
params.pow5Token_: The address of the POW5 token

uniswapV3SwapCallback(int256,int256,byte.details: See {IUniswapV3SwapCallback-uniswapV3SwapCallback} This function is called to the sender after a swap is executed on Uniswap V3. The pool tokens owed for the swap must be payed. The caller of this method must be checked to be a UniswapV3Pool deployed by the canonical UniswapV3Factory. amount0Delta and amount1Delta can both be 0 if no tokens were swapped.
